wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Kevin Riley (born 18 November 1981) is an English cricketer. Riley is a right-handed batsman. He was born in Rushcliffe, Nottinghamshire.
Riley represented the Nottinghamshire Cricket Board in a single List A match against Cumberland in the 1st round of the 2003 Cheltenham & Gloucester Trophy which was played in 2002. In his only List A match he scored a 2 runs.He currently plays club cricket for Caythorpe Cricket Club in Nottinghamshire Cricket Board Premier League.
